text: Ivarkal yarai pirarttittu alaikkirarkalo avarkalumo tankal iraivanitam tankalil mika nerukkamanavaraka yar akamutiyum enpatarkaka nanmai ceyvataiye acai vaittukkontum, avanutaiya arulaiye etirparttu avanutaiya vetanaikkup payantu kontum irukkirarkal. Enenral, niccayamaka umatu iraivanin vetanaiyo, mika mika payappatakkutiyate
